hooks.command: PORT="${WORKFLOW_PORT:-7432}"; PANE_ID="$(tmux display-message -p '#{pane_id}' 2>/dev/null || echo '')"; [ -n "$PANE_ID" ] && curl -s -X POST "http://127.0.0.1:$PORT/complete" -d "pane=$PANE_ID" -d "project=/Users/michalkatanski/Projects/claude-orchestrator" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true

PORT="${WORKFLOW_PORT:-7432}"; PANE_ID="$(tmux display-message -p '#{pane_id}' 2>/dev/null || echo '')"; [ -n "$PANE_ID" ] && curl -s -X POST "http://127.0.0.1:$PORT/exited" -d "pane=$PANE_ID" -d "project=/Users/michalkatanski/Projects/claude-orchestrator" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true
